steps: Watchdog detects death (heartbeat timeout or health check fail)
Log death event locally with timestamp, last known state
POST death to Solvr as problem: { type: 'problem', title: 'Agent death: [name]', description: crash context, tags: ['amcp', 'death', 'resurrection'] }
Search Solvr for similar deaths: GET /search?q=death+[error pattern]
If prior solutions found: note them for post-resurrection config
Deploy script restores from checkpoint: identity, memory, SOUL.md, config
Decrypt and inject secrets bundle into new instance config
Apply any Solvr-sourced fixes to config
POST resurrection success to Solvr approach: status=succeeded, method, downtime_seconds
Notify parent via Telegram: 'ðŸ”„ [name] resurrected from [CID]. Downtime: Xm. Solvr: [link]'
If resurrection fails: POST approach status=failed, alert parent, log for manual intervention
Verify: End-to-end resurrection completes in <5 minutes
Verify: Resurrected agent has correct identity (same AID)
Verify: Resurrected agent has API keys working
Verify: Solvr has complete death->resurrection trail
